Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory309.png'}
{3: 'By the time the last Corrupted is defeated, the celebration inside the Forsaken camp is already coming to a close.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard Leader', 3: "Reporting, Sir! We've finished inspecting, and there is only minimal damage to the camp with no casualties. No one has even noticed the Corrupted were here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hmm... How about the Babylonian? We're in trouble if our supplier gets injured...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The CUB nearby stands up and makes a low electronic sound toward one of the checkpoints. Watanabe raises an arm, and the Patrol Leader slowly approaches the checkpoint.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: 'The... "supplier" is here indeed. So are the kids.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe breathes a sigh of relief. He looks at the children sleeping in each others' arms, with their slow, deep breaths."}
{3: 'Without a word, he removes his jacket and walks up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Only children would do something like that.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It might have been a lament, or maybe acceptance. Watanabe covers the sleeping children with his blanket, his motion remarkably gentle.'}
{3: 'The soldiers standing around also approach, carefully picking up the children and carrying them to a tent inside the camp along the paved trail.'}
{3: 'Watanabe stays behind and walks toward you, crouching and shaking you awake.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You awake yet, 【kuroname】? You helped with the decoration, didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Is that so? I'll leave it, then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Seems like it took a lot of effort.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Even when they're forsaken on Earth, kids are still gonna be kids... With their kid logic and priorities and choices.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Some things don't get taken away by a catastrophe. That's why I stayed behind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And you, and your garden of Eden... should know this better than I do.', 4: '1'}
{1: '9563', 2: 'I... can submit a request.', 3: '33', 4: 'Babylonia may be able to help raise them.', 5: '34'}
{3: "A frown flashes over Watanabe's face for a second, and then he is his usual, calm self again, shaking his head."}
{3: 'Watanabe holds his hand up, indicating that this is the end of this discussion.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't think a fake paradise like Babylonia will provide them with a real future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The silly, purposeless decorations, the childlike innocence, and the essence of a human being...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The only thing we can build upon is the thing they grasp in their hands.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you mean... their creativity?', 3: '39', 4: 'Do you mean... their hope?', 5: '39'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Maybe. But whatever it is, they are the children of the Forsaken, and they are the future of humankind.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe pats the CUB next to him, and his expression softens.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's not how powerful they are on the battlefield... It's the other thing, the feeling you have when you know you have it by your side...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That\'s what Asimov meant by "partner," I think.', 3: '44'}
{3: 'Watanabe does not answer you. He goes ahead and disconnects with the CUB, letting it revert to its standby state.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The location of our delivery is the outpost of the abandoned city you marked?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "About a station away from there is a supply port of ours. It's a neutral zone and close to Babylonia's outpost.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll take you there now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I wanted to say that I needed a ride, but I don't see why I need to hide from you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've been asked to keep you safe, 【kuroname】, understood? I know it's supposed to be your solo mission, but we better be safe than sorry.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard Leader', 3: "Mr. Watanabe, Sir, you're leaving already?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: "Hold on, Sir, you said you'd cook for us when we're back!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guard Leader', 3: '...We never get to taste your dishes! Do you really have to go now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The soldiers all put down the supplies they are collecting, sounding disappointed.'}
{1: '977', 2: 'Do we really need to go now?', 3: '60', 4: 'I... also want to try your cooking.', 5: '61'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yes, we do, pronto.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's... for another day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Winter is coming, and our to-do list is unusually long—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "【kuroname】, we'll leave the other businesses for the next time we meet. As for you guys—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe snaps his finger at his people.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Plan's not changing. We'll see when I get back.", 4: '1'}
